alert.note: Alert for Chase; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 7:44PM CDT until April 19 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Chase County in east central Kansas... East central Marion County in central Kansas... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 740 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northeast of Florence, moving northeast at 35 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR MARION AND CHASE COUNTIES. HAZARD...Three inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Marion, Cottonwood Falls, Strong City, Florence, Elmdale, Cedar Point, Hymer, Saffordville, Tallgrass Prairie and Tallgrass Prairie Preserve. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...3.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
